attributes.title: Worst App Imaginable
attributes.review: This app is a gateway to the presidents candidacy and in my opinion it is the worst app that could be downloaded. For one everyone thinks he made all these jobs but in reality the jobs were always there, no one wants to admit it because then they would be wrong. The jobs have always been there but white america hasn't seen them. anyways 👁 dont get the app 💕

attributes.title: Horrible App ! Don’t download
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it was glitched very badly to the point I had to delete it ! Also , I have no idea why I got the app , trump is a bad man . He is a rapist , racist , and a orange flop in America. He is trying to ruin the teens /kids lives by taking down TikTok ! And the TikTok and Chinese community would be very upset if the government did . So please help the TikTok community by leaving a bad reviews.

attributes.title: 🧚🏾‍♂️🧚🏾‍♂️Trump 2020❤️😁but in a prison cell 🧚🏾‍♂️☺️💀
attributes.review: Let’s start from here, it took a whole day to download, and when I tried to sign in it kept kicking me out! It was probably because the president before this(my president Obama) was telling me not to mess with this app because it will bring bad karma. Onto you. Also just a terrible app created by a terrible person. Have a great day and DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app is a horrible app, I tried to download the app but it didn't even work! After a few tries it finally decided to work, once I open the app it gets me out of the app! I was so mad, but I continued to try. I deleted the app and downloaded it again. Yet, it still did not work! Once it finally opened all these adds started popping up! This is the WORST APP EVER!!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!! YOU WILL REGRET!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: this is the WORST APP EVER!!!! when i downloaded this app it was so glitchy and it made my whole phone SHUT DOWN!!! all i wanted to do was support my president 😢😢. then when i got off the app SOME BROKE INTO MY HOUSE! and when i deleted it they left! then i downloaded it again because i wanted to support my amazing president 🍊and BUGS CRAWLED OUT OF MY PHONE! then my phone exploded!! trust me do NOT download this app it is so horrible!!

attributes.title: BLACK LIVES MATTER
attributes.review:
Can I just start off by saying this is the worst app EVER!!!! The system in which the app works in is complete trash!! It made my new iPhone 11 Pro Max glitch so bad!!!!!(Actually I have the 8😞)
Literally DO NOT download this app it is the worst thing possible to exist on the App Store. Not to mention the amount of biased and fake news stories. Absolute trash! Disgusting! Horrible!
Disappointed! Just NOOOOO!!!!!✨💕🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: Trump 2020✨🦋
attributes.review: I got this app to better understand why some people still feel lead to support Donald trump but with further research on this app I realize that others are simply blinded by his ignorance and can’t see that he has and will always be a racist, homophobic, misogynistic, rapist, and if you can’t see why he is unfit to run this country then you are a lost cause and THAT is none of my busines💕

attributes.title: Inappropriate nudity
attributes.review: I was just minding business in my lovely suburban  home. I decided after hearing my gorgeous family talking about our president. I decided to download the app to get the inside scoop. I came across our president’s nude photos. I was admittedly taken back by the disgusting photos. This is a warning to whoever would like to download the app. I’m just looking out for my fellow Americans.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: this app literally doesn’t work properly. Like it has for other people it took weeks to even load and once it did it wouldn’t stop glitching. I’m sure I have viruses due to this app. Along with that the design of it is just off and disturbing to my eyes. The fact that Trumps face, sorry President Trump’s face is everywhere really bothers me; they should remove it. Period.

attributes.title: Outrageous and DAMNING
attributes.review: This is simply the worst thing I've ever downloaded. Took hours and hours to launch and after entering my phone number I immediately recieved a dozen text messages from local prostitutes asking me if they could "yoink my boink". The app itself does not take me past registration and FROZE MY PHONE many times before I simply gave up. The program is as incapable asthe bunker boy himself 💕
